"<%me>!<br>Look over there!": "Those are, Darkers! They also appeared during our fight with the Emperor of Verun..."

"While I had brought over [Elder]'s power,
it seems that his Darker underlings are everywhere."

"Even though we're inside the Akashic Record, they're
just like the ones from our universe. They'll be a
major pain in our ass if you don't kill them all."
"While we do have data on them, they still have their numbers. Let's fight them with caution."
